EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Strata!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for being one of the hundreds of visitors to the Pivotal booth <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYmGoobvUU8&list=PL055Epbe6d5Y8_iZPo7pH3hOnAtchMCJt&index=3> at Strata + Hadoop World in New York. What a great show!
In case you missed any of the cool stuff we did outside of the booth, here’s a quick recap:
- Spectacular Sessions – Including Image Processing on Hadoop <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/schedule/detail/36339> and those that were part of Industrial Internet Day <http://strataconf.com/stratany2014/public/content/industrial-internet-day>. - Awesome Announcements – Did you hear the news about the Data Lake Hadoop Bundle 2.0 <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/emc-pivotal-data-lake-hadoop-bundle-offers-simplicity-and-control-of-massive-data-sets-and-analytic-workloads>? We also reported on growing customer momentum for the Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite-most-comprehensive-toolset-of-industry-leading-big-data-technologies>. - Marvelous Meetup – Video <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mzhXOPJssDo&list=PL62pIycqXx-RsbxZF9dU5nvpg-NRtyBNj> of the Evolution of Data Architectures: Pivotal’s Data Lake Vision for 2015 <http://www.meetup.com/Pivotal-Software-NYC/events/210466062/> meetup with Tachyon is now posted.
Pivotal is excited to be a part of how data is shaping the future. Please visit our website <http://pivotal.io> to learn more about Business Data Lakes <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data> and join the revolution in data infrastructure.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
